title: Help with three IDs
content:
Hello,

I'm doing some research for a pitch and it would be wonderful to be able to identify these typefaces. I'm new to the game so I would really appreciate any expertise.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-22%20at%209_6159.03.17%20AM.jpg)

Thanks in advance!
author: g_goodrich

comments.content: I've attached images of the three as well.

CRÊME DE LA CRÊME: [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123939/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) Light  
OUTLIERS: [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123939/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Didot) Italic (best digitization is [Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123939/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/didot/overview) by H&FJ)  
MAISON GERARD: [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804123939/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/futura) manually outlined
Thank you so much! You are amazing.
